common_wip_description: This feature is currently under development. Stay tuned for updates!
common_template_example_description: This page is a placeholder to demonstrate the routing and navigation structure. Developers using this template should replace this with their own feature implementation.
settings_description: Manage your application preferences and configurations.
settings_wipDescription: We are working on a comprehensive settings panel to give you full control over your experience.
profile_description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile_personalInfo_usernameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.
profile_personalInfo_bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
dashboard_welcome_title: Welcome to your new SvelteKit App!
dashboard_welcome_description: This template is designed to help you build production-ready applications faster. Here is a quick overview of what's included.
dashboard_feature_auth_desc: Complete auth flow with login, protected routes, and token refresh logic.
dashboard_feature_i18n_desc: Type-safe translations using Paraglide JS. Try switching languages!
dashboard_feature_ui_desc: Beautiful, accessible components built with Tailwind CSS and Bits UI.
dashboard_feature_api_desc: OpenAPI integration with auto-generated types for your .NET backend.
dashboard_guide_step1: Explore the `src/routes` folder to see how pages are structured.
dashboard_guide_step4: The backend is built with .NET. Run `npm run api:generate` to update the client when the API changes.
error_403_description: You don't have permission to be here. Nice try though, we appreciate the effort.
error_404_description: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been abducted by aliens.
error_500_description: The server is having a bad day. Our code monkeys are working hard to fix it.
error_default_description: Something went wrong. We're not sure what, but it's probably not good.
